name: Site-19 維安資料 19.2022.10.31
description:
此頁面為SCP繁中維基中的展示頁。

此作品以 CC-BY-SA 3.0 授權。作者：Ignota 翻譯：Mang Gwan
此作品中使用的字體 Silver 由 Poppy Works 及 Wolfgang Wozniak 制作，以 CC-BY 4.0 授權。

原作頁面的中文翻譯：

這是我參加  SCP 維基的 Halloweencon2022 比賽的藝術部分的頁面！我有點過頭了。 與所有其他 SCP 內容一樣，此遊戲以 CC-BY-SA 3.0 授權。遊戲中包含所有角色和異常的連結。 角色： SCP-166 by DrClef and Cerastes SCP-2017 by MissMercurial SCP-6080 by ratking666 Abigail Lacroix by Abrethe SCP-2241 by Tuomey Tombstone SCP-3663 by MaliceAforethought Phoebe by hetarae SCP-1003 by Doctor Flibble Dr. Desmarais by Metaphysician Kuobach by IronShears Karcist Halyna Ieva by Naepic Agent Jones by DrAkimoto SCP-191 by DrClef and Sylocat SCP-134 by Skali Sharpnose, Voct, and Unknown Author SCP-2118 by ahbonjour Chloe and Janet by Dr Asteria Toby McEnderson by OriTiefling Director Calvin Bold and SCP-6469 by Calibold Site Director Basar by UncertaintyCrossing Snapdragon by Snapdragon133 Dr Cerise by Dr Cerise Dr Asteria by Dr Asteria Dr Theron Sherman by Theesherm Irizu by Skorpt Ariel Ovo by Seraphannim D-5761 by D-5761 Tyler Umen by Tyumen Ines Bernard by Tao McCawley Prim by Fantem Jack by Agent Whitney SCP-2192 by PurpleCheetah Dr Fern by Dr Fern Dr Lucretia Deamonne by Zygard SCP-053 by DrGears SCP-682 by DrGears and Epic Phail Spy
